prompt_base: photorealistic render of a floating cosmic deity, radiant skin, spherical head shape, wide innocent eyes, small stature, 8k digital art, volumetric lighting
feature_prompt: smooth bioluminescent skin texture, intricate segmented patterns on head, sharp details in each glowing pattern, high quality silk robes fabric, otherworldly presence
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, human proportions, fleshy skin, nose, mouth, ears, muscular, childish, simple, plastic, flat color, low quality, poorly drawn shape
